data.description: We are currently seeking an AI Engineer Intern located in our Dallas, TX office. This is a paid summer internship opportunity with housing provided if needed. We are looking for a motivated and curious AI Engineering Intern to join our team. This internship is ideal for someone passionate about applying artificial intelligence and data science to real-world business challenges. You will gain hands-on experience working with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities for automation, build proof-of-concept models, and contribute to our AI strategy.
